source.class:
*
This abstract class represents a physical model. Instances of this * class determinate the current quantities dimensions. *
To select a model, one needs only to call the model select * static method. For example:[code] * public static void main(String[] args) { * // Global (LocalContext should be used for thread-local settings). * RelativisticModel.select(); * ... * [/code] *
Selecting a predefined model automatically sets the dimension of * the {@link javax.measure.unit.BaseUnit base units}. Jean-Marie Dautelle 3.1, April 22, 2006
* Holds the current physical model.
<declaration type="LocalContext.Reference" name="Current" />
* Holds the dimensional model.
* Default constructor (allows for derivation).
* Returns the current physical model (default: instance of {@link StandardModel}). the context-local physical model.
* Sets the current model (this method is called when the a predefined * model is selected). model the context-local physical model. #current
